item.title: Azure: Manage Entra ID users via Azure Portal
item.description: In this post we will learn how to create, edit and delete Microsoft Entra ID users. Microsoft Entra ID is an integrated cloud identity and access solution, and a leader in the market for managing directories, enabling access to applications, and protecting identities. To create a user, first navigate to Microsoft Entra ID in the Azure Portal. Then click on Users. You will be seeing the Users page. On the left hand menu, we can see the following tabs:
